Trade/Device Name(s): Freelite Human Kappa Free Kit for use on the SPApLus
Freelite Human Kappa Kit for use on the SpaPLUS
Regulation Name(s): Immunoglobulin (light chain specific) immunological test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Freelite Human Kappa Free Kit for quantitation of kappa free light chains in serum and urine using the Binding Site SPApLus
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitation of kappa free light chains in serum and urine to aid in diagnosis and monitoring of multiple myeloma, lymphocytic neoplasms, Waldenström's macroglobulinaemia, AL amyloidosis, light chain deposition disease and connective tissue diseases such as SLE, in conjunction with other laboratory and clinical findings.
